SELECT o.order_no, g.thumb, g.name, o.total_price, o.amount, o.pay, o.delivery_state, o.dt FROM orders o, goods g WHERE o.goods_no = g.goods_no AND o.delivery_state IN ('1','2','3','4','7') AND o.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY order_no DESC
SELECT * FROM goods g, cart c WHERE g.goods_no = c.goods_no AND c.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT cr.class_name as className, t.name as name, cr.dt as dt, c.address as address, cr.pay_yn as pay, u.user_no, c.class_no FROM class_reserve cr, tutor t, users u, class c WHERE cr.class_no = c.class_no AND u.user_no = cr.user_no AND cr.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT s.scrap_no, c.thumb as thumb, c.category, c.name, c.address, c.price, c.class_no FROM scrap s, class c WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.board_no = c.class_no AND s.user_no = #{userNo}
